special_days.name: Imbolc
special_days.description: Imbolc marks the first signs of spring. It's a time to celebrate the return of life and the arrival of new growth. Wiccans use this time to cleanse their homes and welcome new beginnings into their lives.
special_days.poem:
Imbolcâ€™s fire, a guiding light,
To cleanse the old and spark the bright.
Sweep the hearth and set your aim,
Begin anew in Brigidâ€™s name.

special_days.name: Ostara
special_days.description: Ostara marks the spring equinox. It's a time to celebrate the balance of light and dark and to look ahead to the growth and renewal of spring. Wiccans come together to plant seeds and watch the world come back to life.
special_days.poem:
Ostara greets the dawnâ€™s bright glow,
As light and dark share equal show.
Plant a seed and watch it grow,
Spring awakens, soft and slow.

special_days.name: Beltane
special_days.description: Beltane marks the beginning of summer. It's a time to celebrate the fertility of the earth and the arrival of new life. Wiccans come together to dance, sing, and make merry to mark this special day.
special_days.poem:
Beltane fires in moonlit glade,
Mark loveâ€™s embrace and life displayed.
Dance with joy â€˜neath skies so wide,
And weave the threads where dreams reside.

special_days.name: Litha
special_days.description: Litha marks the summer solstice. It's a time to celebrate the power of the sun and the longest day of the year. Pagans come together to light fires, dance, and sing to mark this special day.
special_days.poem:
The sun at peak, its golden flame,
On Lithaâ€™s day, no dark can claim.
Bathe in light, embrace its glow,
And let your inner fire grow.

special_days.name: Lammas
special_days.description: Lammas marks the beginning of the harvest season. It's a time to give thanks for the abundance of the earth and to prepare for the coming winter. Wiccans come together to exchange gifts and enjoy feasts to mark this special day.
special_days.poem:
Lammas fields of amber grain,
Give thanks for sun and summer rain.
Share your bread, your heart, your care,
And bless the earth with all you bear.

special_days.name: Mabon
special_days.description: Mabon marks the autumn equinox. It's a time to celebrate the balance of light and dark and to look ahead to the chill of winter. Wiccans come together to harvest crops, exchange gifts, and enjoy feasts to mark this special day.
special_days.poem:
Mabonâ€™s time, the scales now sway,
Equal hours of night and day.
Gather fruits and share the feast,
Celebrate the earthâ€™s increase.

special_days.name: Samhain
special_days.description: This festival marks the end of the harvest season. It's a time to reflect on the past year and honour the ancestors who have come before us. Samhain is also a time to connect with the spirit world and seek guidance for the future.
special_days.poem:
The veil grows thin on Samhain night,
A time for dreams and spiritâ€™s sight.
Light a flame for those once near,
And seek their wisdom, calm and clear.

special_days.name: Yule
special_days.description: Yule marks the winter solstice. It's a time to celebrate the return of the light and the rebirth of the sun. Pagans come together to exchange gifts, light candles, and enjoy feasts to mark this special day.
special_days.poem:
Yuleâ€™s bright star in longest night,
Brings hope of dawn and coming light.
Exchange your gifts, sing songs of cheer,
The wheel has turned; new life draws near.

lunar_phases.description: The start of a new lunar cycle.
lunar_phases.poem:
The New Moon hides in shadowâ€™s care,
A time to dream, to softly dare.
Write your wishes, plant them deep,
Let whispered hopes in darkness keep.

lunar_phases.description: Named after the howling of hungry wolves in midwinter, this moon symbolises strength and survival in the coldest time of the year.
lunar_phases.poem:
Beneath the snow and howling skies,
The Wolf Moon watches, ancient, wise.
A time to gather strength and rest,
And light a candle, for whatâ€™s best.

lunar_phases.description: The start of a new lunar cycle.
lunar_phases.poem:
The New Moon hides in shadowâ€™s care,
A time to dream, to softly dare.
Write your wishes, plant them deep,
Let whispered hopes in darkness keep.

lunar_phases.description: Reflecting the heavy snowfall of late winter, the Snow Moon represents the purity and quiet beauty of the season.
lunar_phases.poem:
The Snow Moon casts its tranquil glow,
Upon the earth where frost does grow.
  Wrap in warmth, let dreams ignite,
Burn cedarâ€™s scent in soft moonlight.

lunar_phases.description: The start of a new lunar cycle.
lunar_phases.poem:
The New Moon hides in shadowâ€™s care,
A time to dream, to softly dare.
Write your wishes, plant them deep,
Let whispered hopes in darkness keep.

lunar_phases.description: Named for the thawing ground and the return of worms, this moon signals the rebirth of the soil as spring approaches.
lunar_phases.poem:
The Worm Moon stirs the thawing ground,
Where seeds of life are newly found.
Turn the soil of heart and mind,
Write your dreams, and leave fear behind.

lunar_phases.description: The start of a new lunar cycle.
lunar_phases.poem:
The New Moon hides in shadowâ€™s care,
A time to dream, to softly dare.
Write your wishes, plant them deep,
Let whispered hopes in darkness keep.

lunar_phases.description: Named for the abundance of blooming flowers, this moon symbolises growth and beauty in full swing.
lunar_phases.poem:
Petals bloom in moonlit air,
A fragrant world beyond compare.
Plant your dreams in fertile ground,
Let love and joy in all things abound.

lunar_phases.description: The start of a new lunar cycle.
lunar_phases.poem:
The New Moon hides in shadowâ€™s care,
A time to dream, to softly dare.
Write your wishes, plant them deep,
Let whispered hopes in darkness keep.

lunar_phases.description: A tribute to the ripening of strawberries, this moon marks the sweet beginning of summer.
lunar_phases.poem:
The Strawberry Moon, ripe and red,
A time to savour whatâ€™s been bred.
Sip something sweet, give thanks, rejoice,
And honour life with grateful voice.

lunar_phases.description: The start of a new lunar cycle.
lunar_phases.poem:
The New Moon hides in shadowâ€™s care,
A time to dream, to softly dare.
Write your wishes, plant them deep,
Let whispered hopes in darkness keep.

lunar_phases.description: Named for summerâ€™s frequent thunderstorms, this moon carries the energy of midsummer storms. Also known as Buck Moon.
lunar_phases.poem:
Thunder roars, the moonâ€™s alive,
With storms of passion, dreams will thrive.
Dance in rain or light a flame,
And cleanse your soul of doubt or shame.

lunar_phases.description: The start of a new lunar cycle.
lunar_phases.poem:
The New Moon hides in shadowâ€™s care,
A time to dream, to softly dare.
Write your wishes, plant them deep,
Let whispered hopes in darkness keep.

lunar_phases.description: Reflecting the ripening fields of grain, this moon celebrates abundance and gratitude for the first harvest. Also known as Sturgeon Moon.
lunar_phases.poem:
Fields of grain in moonlight bask,
A time to gather, a sacred task.
Share your wealth, both bright and deep,
And sow whatâ€™s needed for the reap.

lunar_phases.description: The start of a new lunar cycle.
lunar_phases.poem:
The New Moon hides in shadowâ€™s care,
A time to dream, to softly dare.
Write your wishes, plant them deep,
Let whispered hopes in darkness keep.

lunar_phases.description: The full moon closest to the autumn equinox, the Harvest Moon lights the way for farmers gathering crops late into the night.
lunar_phases.poem:
The Harvest Moon, so round, so bright,
Guides weary hands through autumnâ€™s night.
Reflect on work, both done and due,
And thank the world for gifting you.

lunar_phases.description: The start of a new lunar cycle.
lunar_phases.poem:
The New Moon hides in shadowâ€™s care,
A time to dream, to softly dare.
Write your wishes, plant them deep,
Let whispered hopes in darkness keep.

lunar_phases.description: Traditionally aiding hunters in tracking game, this moon symbolises preparation and sustenance.
lunar_phases.poem:
The Hunterâ€™s Moon is sharp and keen,
A guide through shadows yet unseen.
Prepare your heart, your tools, your way,
And let the moonlight mark your stay.

lunar_phases.description: The start of a new lunar cycle.
lunar_phases.poem:
The New Moon hides in shadowâ€™s care,
A time to dream, to softly dare.
Write your wishes, plant them deep,
Let whispered hopes in darkness keep.

lunar_phases.description: Named for the first frost of the season, this moon marks the transition to winterâ€™s stillness. Also known as Beaver Moon.
lunar_phases.poem:
Frost-kissed trees stand still and bare,
A quiet world in winter's care.
Beneath the moon's soft silver glow,
A time of peace, as storms lie low.

lunar_phases.description: The start of a new lunar cycle.
lunar_phases.poem:
The New Moon hides in shadowâ€™s care,
A time to dream, to softly dare.
Write your wishes, plant them deep,
Let whispered hopes in darkness keep.

lunar_phases.description: Reflecting the chill of winterâ€™s embrace, this moon represents endurance and reflection.
lunar_phases.poem:
The Cold Moon whispers of the past,
Of trials endured and shadows cast.
Sip warm tea, let heartbeats mend,
Prepare your soul for yearâ€™s new bend.

lunar_phases.description: The start of a new lunar cycle.
lunar_phases.poem:
The New Moon hides in shadowâ€™s care,
A time to dream, to softly dare.
Write your wishes, plant them deep,
Let whispered hopes in darkness keep.

zodiac.name: Birch
zodiac.mythical_creature: White Hart - Purity, power, and nobility.

zodiac.name: Rowan
zodiac.animal: Crane - Longevity, wisdom, and spiritual strength.
zodiac.mythical_creature: Dragon - Transformation, growth, and new beginnings.

zodiac.name: Ash
zodiac.mythical_creature: Sea Serpent - Hidden depths and transformation.

zodiac.name: Willow
zodiac.mythical_creature: Hare - Magic, fertility, and new life.

zodiac.name: Hawthorn
zodiac.mythical_creature: Unicorn - Purity, grace, and divine guidance.

zodiac.name: Oak
zodiac.mythical_creature: White Horse - Power, freedom, and victory.

zodiac.name: Hazel
zodiac.mythical_creature: Salmon of Knowledge - Quest for wisdom and understanding.

zodiac.name: Ivy
zodiac.mythical_creature: Faerie - Magic and the hidden realms of nature.
